name: Krampus (itch) (TsunamaCade)
description:
You Should Have Stayed In Bed

Now you've upset the jolly fat man himself, and you shall pay dearly for being the naughty child you are.

This short 10 minute game was made in 1 month, originally planned for the 15th, but things got...messy. 

Long story short, you must survive Santa's best hunter, Krampus. This cool guy likes to kidnap children and beat them with a stick, and now he's come for you. But that was mainly your fault, wasn't it? You should have just stayed asleep like you were suppose to...

Oh well...

 Anyways, good luck!
